availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Robert W. Wolfenbarger (Union County, Tennessee, farmer)

body.p: Union County, Tennessee, farmer. Tennessee native. Married to Elizabeth Williams in Grainger County, Tennessee, in February 1846. Wolfenbarger. Father of Almarinda Wolfenbarger, Alfred T. Wolfenbarger, Caroline J. Wolfenbarger, John W. Wolfenbarger, and Elizabeth M. Wolfenbarger. Farmer in Grainger County, Tennessee, in 1850. Farmer in Union County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Tennessee, Grainger County, District 14, p. 245.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Tennessee, Union County, District 1, p. 427.
Tennessee State Marriages, 1780-2002, Tennessee State Library and Archives, Nashville, Tennessee, p. 1519 of 1559 on microfilm (accessed via Ancestry.com).
Find A Grave, "Robert W. Wolfenbarger (February 6, 1822-May 5, 1896)," Memorial #5256649, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/5256649 (accessed January 30, 2020).
